tweets.text: Further more if it's true that red only posted a ¬£1m bond then you've breached the landfill directive https://t.co/zdffKM8KDU

*This* is why we have a phosphate pollution problem in Herefordshire rivers. Massive pile of chicken muck dumped right next to watercourse. Completely against the farming rules for water.
